components.name: DatepickerComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field subscriptSizing="dynamic">
  <input (dateChange)="getDateAndEmitEvent($event)" [matDatepicker]="picker" [max]="today" [value]="selectedDate"
         disabled
         matInput>
  <mat-datepicker-toggle [for]="picker" matSuffix></mat-datepicker-toggle>
  <mat-datepicker #picker disabled="false"></mat-datepicker>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: DatepickerMonthYearComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field subscriptSizing="dynamic">
  <input [formControl]="dateControl" [matDatepicker]="dp" [max]="maxDate" matInput>
  <mat-datepicker-toggle [for]="dp" matSuffix></mat-datepicker-toggle>
  <mat-datepicker #dp
                  (monthSelected)="chosenMonthHandler($event, dp)"
                  (yearSelected)="chosenYearHandler($event)"
                  panelClass="example-month-picker"
                  startView="year">
  </mat-datepicker>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: InlineTextEditorComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field>
    <textarea #autosize="cdkTextareaAutosize"
              #textarea
              (focusout)="onCancel($event, textarea)"
              [maxLength]="MAXIMUM_LETTERS"
              [value]="comment ? comment : ''"
              cdkAutosizeMaxRows="3"
              cdkAutosizeMinRows="1"
              cdkTextareaAutosize
              matInput>
    </textarea>
  <mat-hint align="end">{{textarea.value.length}} / {{MAXIMUM_LETTERS}}</mat-hint>
</mat-form-field>
<button (click)="onCancel($event, textarea)" aria-label="arrow-back" class="cancel" mat-mini-fab>
  <mat-icon>arrow_back</mat-icon>
</button>
<button (click)="onSave(textarea)" aria-label="save" class="save" id="savebutton" mat-mini-fab>
  <mat-icon>save</mat-icon>
</button>

components.name: PmProgressComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-table [dataSource]="displayedEmployees" class="mat-elevation-z1 table-container">
  <ng-container matColumnDef="in-charge">
    <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>{{'monthly-report.pm-progress-bottom-sheet.in-charge' | translate}}</mat-header-cell>
    <mat-cell *matCellDef="let element"> {{element.name}} </mat-cell>
  </ng-container>

  <ng-container matColumnDef="checked">
    <mat-header-cell *matHeaderCellDef>{{'monthly-report.pm-progress-bottom-sheet.finished' | translate}}</mat-header-cell>
    <mat-cell *matCellDef="let element">
      <app-state-indicator [state]="element.state" size="small"></app-state-indicator>
    </mat-cell>
  </ng-container>

  <mat-header-row *matHeaderRowDef="displayedColumns;"></mat-header-row>
  <mat-row *matRowDef="let row; columns: displayedColumns;"></mat-row>
</mat-table>

components.name: ProjectStateSelectComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-select #select
            (selectionChange)="onSelectionChange($event)"
            [(value)]="value"
            [class.select-green]="select.value === ProjectState.DONE || select.value === ProjectState.NOT_RELEVANT"
            [class.select-red]="select.value === ProjectState.OPEN"
            [class.select-yellow]="select.value === ProjectState.WORK_IN_PROGRESS">
  <mat-option [disabled]="isInProgressSelected"
              [value]="ProjectState.OPEN"
              data-cy="option-open">{{'STATE.OPEN' | translate}}</mat-option>
  <mat-option [disabled]="isNotRelevantSelected"
              [value]="ProjectState.WORK_IN_PROGRESS"
              data-cy="option-in-progress">{{'STATE.WORK_IN_PROGRESS' | translate}}</mat-option>
  <mat-option [disabled]="isNotRelevantSelected"
              [value]="ProjectState.DONE"
              data-cy="option-done">{{'STATE.DONE' | translate}}</mat-option>
  <mat-option [value]="ProjectState.NOT_RELEVANT"
              data-cy="option-not-relevant">{{'STATE.NOT_RELEVANT' | translate}}</mat-option>
</mat-select>

components.name: StateSelectComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-select #select
            (selectionChange)="onSelectionChange($event)"
            [class.select-green]="select.value === State.DONE"
            [class.select-red]="select.value === State.OPEN"
            [value]="value">
  <mat-option [value]="State.OPEN" data-cy="option-open">{{'STATE.OPEN' | translate}}</mat-option>
  <mat-option [value]="State.DONE" data-cy="option-done">{{'STATE.DONE' | translate}}</mat-option>
</mat-select>

  PAGE_URLS: {
    MONTHLY_REPORT: 'monthlyReport',

    LOGIN: 'login',
    ERROR: 'error'

    Fatal: 5,
    Off: 6

  logWithDate: true,

    horizontalPosition: 'center',
    verticalPosition: 'top',
    duration: 5000
  }
}

functions.name: comparePmEntriesFn
functions.description:
Die Projekte sollen wie folgt sortiert werden: Projekte, bei denen etwas zutun ist, sollen vor projekte, bei denen nichts zutun ist, sein, sprich "TodoProject" > "Project" Ein Project ist ein "TodoProject", sobald eines der folgenden Kriterien zutrifft: - Mitarbeiter berprfung nicht fertig - Projectcontrolling Status ist 'Offen' oder 'In Arbeit' - Projectbilling Status ist 'Offen' oder 'In Arbeit' Danach soll erst nach den Projektnamen alphabetisch aufsteigend sortiert werden (AAA vor BBB)

!!! AUFRUFER MUSS SORT().REVERSE aufrufen, weil javascript standardmig asc sortiert und hier die logik quasi invertiert ist !!!

functions.name: toMonthYearString
functions.description: month 1, year 2023 results to [month-name by locale settings] 2023 e.g. Jnner 2023 in 'de-At'
